message.raw:
This stemmed from trying start the world paused (-u) with dynamically spawned models.
The model->Init() call does not need to be done when Loading through World::Load() but
needs to be done when calling through ProcessEntitiesToLoad().  Here are the fixes:
 * moved pause to after init in main.cc
 * add a bool flag "initModel" to LoadEntities/LoadModel.

message:
This stemmed from trying start the world paused (-u) with dynamically spawned models.
The model->Init() call does not need to be done when Loading through World::Load() but
needs to be done when calling through ProcessEntitiesToLoad().  Here are the fixes:
 * moved pause to after init in main.cc
 * add a bool flag "initModel" to LoadEntities/LoadModel.
